property.name: objectLabel
property.value: Batch Job Result

property.name: objectDescription
property.value: Object that holds the results of a batch job

property.name: summary
property.value: A description of the entity.

property.name: description
property.value: A description of the entity.

property.name: objectDescription
property.value: A description of the entity.

property.name: summary
property.value:
The parameters or options specified when the batch job was run
Note the list may be empty but it cannot be null

property.name: description
property.value:
The parameters or options specified when the batch job was run
Note the list may be empty but it cannot be null

property.name: summary
property.value: The context under which this batch job was run

property.name: description
property.value: The context under which this batch job was run

property.name: objectDescription
property.value: The context under which this batch job was run

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Authenticated Principal Id

property.name: summary
property.value: The Principal Id of the currently authenticated user.

property.name: label
property.value: Authenticated Principal Id

property.name: description
property.value: The Principal Id of the currently authenticated user.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Principal Id

property.name: summary
property.value: The Principal Id of the principal on whose behalf the authenticated principal is acting.

property.name: label
property.value: Principal Id

property.name: description
property.value:
The Principal Id of the principal on whose behalf the authenticated principal is acting. If the authenticated principal is not acting on behalf of a different user, then this Id should be the same as the Authenticated Principal Id.
(1) User is authorized to only act on behalf of itself. Principal Id must equal the Authenticated Principal Id and the authorization is performed on that Id. If the Principal Id differs from the Authenticated Principal Id, then the user is not authorized to perform the requested operation.
(2) User is authorized to act on behalf of another user. The Principal Id differs from the Authentication Principal Id. Authorization is checked to see if Authenticated Principal Id can perform the operation on behalf of Principal Id. Then, authorization is checked to see if Principal Id can perform the operation.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Current Date

property.name: summary
property.value: The current date in this context.

property.name: label
property.value: Current Date

property.name: description
property.value: The current date in this context. This date is used to instruct the provider to peform operations as if this date were the current date.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Global Results

property.name: summary
property.value:
Any global results of running the batch job
This may be a number or a count or a newly created id.

property.name: elementLabel
property.value: Global Result

property.name: description
property.value:
Any global results of running the batch job
This may be a number or a count or a newly created id.
This is in addition to individual Result Items that may be created.
Note the list may be empty but like other lists it must not be null

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Items Processed

property.name: summary
property.value:
Number of items processed
Used to indicate the progress of the batch job
The batch job does not have to update this field every time it processes a job it may decide to update it every 10 or 100 or 1000 items processed.

property.name: label
property.value: Items Processed

property.name: description
property.value:
Number of items processed
Used to indicate the progress of the batch job
The batch job does not have to update this field every time it processes a job it may decide to update it every 10 or 100 or 1000 items processed.
This can be null if the job has not started yet or there are no items This may or may not correspond with the corresponding Result Items that get created

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Items Expected

property.name: summary
property.value: Number of items expected to be processed

property.name: label
property.value: Items Expected

property.name: description
property.value: Number of items expected to be processed

property.name: summary
property.value: Messages describing details of the status.

property.name: description
property.value:
Messages describing details of the status.
Often left null if the status is that it is complete.

property.name: objectDescription
property.value:
Messages describing details of the status.
Often left null if the status is that it is complete.

property.name: summary
property.value: Create and last update info for the structure.

property.name: description
property.value:
Create and last update info for the structure. This is optional and treated as read only since the data is set by the internals of the service during maintenance operations.
Contains audit trail information about the creation and last update of this object Also contains the version ind used for optimistic locking.
Attempts to set or update should result in a ReadOnlyException being thrown.

property.name: objectDescription
property.value:
Create and last update info for the structure. This is optional and treated as read only since the data is set by the internals of the service during maintenance operations.
Contains audit trail information about the creation and last update of this object Also contains the version ind used for optimistic locking.
Attempts to set or update should result in a ReadOnlyException being thrown.
